dmca.title: Google DMCA - CRSQA 4
dmca.body:
Sir or Madam,

This letter is to notify you of multiple violations of the United States Digital Millennium Copyright Act.

The following Unique Resource Locaters (URLs) are an unauthorized publication of pages originally published from 2001 through current. The URL that is a DMCA violation is listed first, immediately followed by the original URL, where available. These URLs are found with a site:LasikFlap.com Google search.

http://www.lasikflap.com/crsqa/glenn_kawesch_0l.pdf
http://www.usaeyes.org/surgeons/glenn_kawesch.htm

http://www.lasikflap.com/crsqa/ 
http://www.usaeyes.org/faq/subjects/QSAC#Hagele

http://www.lasikflap.co/crsqa/kawesch_faces_prison.pdf
http://www.signonsandiego.com/news/metro/20030509-9999-2m9kawesch.html

http://www.lasikflap.com/crsqa/glenn_kawesch_02.pdf
http://www.thesandiegochannel.com/sand/troubleshooter/troubleshooter-122439620020206-1902Ol.htm

http://www.lasikflap.com/Lasiktruth/what_is_false_advertising.htm
http://www.ascrs.org/publications/ao/ae92portman.html


http://www.lasikflap.com/Lasiktruth/conflicts_of_interest.htm
http://www.refractiveeyecare.com/0205-casebeer.pdf

http://www.lasikflap.com/Lasiktruth/index.html
http://www.refractiveeyecare.com/0205-casebeer.pdf

http://www.lasikflap.com/Lasiktruth/illegal_activities.htm
http://www.eyeworld.com

http://www.lasikflap.com/Lasiktruth/malpracticelawsuits.htm
http://www.lawyersweekly.com/

http://www.lasikflap.co/crsqa/secretary-of-state-address.pdf
http://www.kepler.ss.ca.gov/corpdata/ShowAllList?QueryCorpNumber-C22a9958

http://www.lasikflap.com/Lasiktruth/laser_surgery_dangers.htm
Excimer Laser Surgery for Corneal Disorders
Peter S. Hersh, Michael D. Wagoner
ISBN: 3131079614
Publisher: Thieme Publishing

http://www.lasikflap.com/Lasiktnrth/risks.htm
American Journal of Ophthalmology
1997 Mar;123(3):297-302
ISSN: 0002-9394
Publisher: Elsevier Science,

In many instances, the original URL from which the works were pilfered is published in the LasikFlap.com page. In some instances the original work has been removed from Internet publication, however removal from current publication does not diminish or remove owner copy rights.

In addition to DMCA copyright violations, the following three URLs contain personal identity information, including name, address, date of birth, driver's license number, and Social Security numbers in violation of the US Federal Privacy Act of 1974:

http://www.lasikflap.com/crsqa/hagele-bankruptcy.pdf
http://www.lasikflap.com/crsqa/hagele-tax-liens.pdf
http://www.lasikflap.com/crsqa/district-attorney-vs-hagele.pdf

In addition to DMCA copyright violations, the following URL indicates that this doctor is certified by our organization. This doctor is not certified by our organization and publication of such information misinforms the public of the qualifications of medical healthcare providers:

http://www.lasikflap.com/crsqa/glenn_kawesch_0l.pdf
http://www.usaeyes.org/surgeons/glenn_kawesch.htm

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

The owner of the LasikFlap.com website is unknown. The domain ownership is cloaked.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

[signed]
[private]
Executive Director
dmca.principal_name: CRSQA Council for Refractive Surgery Quality Assurance
